high_descs: Turn around and go to the end of the bunk-bed to your right.
Pick up the basketball that is on the floor, in front of the bed.
Turn around and go to the lamp an the top, left end of the desk.
Turn the lamp on while still holding the basketball.
turn to the right and take a few steps and turn to the right and go to the wall and turn to the right facing a basketball on the floor
pick up the basketball from the floor
turn to the right and go to the end of the desk
turn on the lamp on the top shelf of the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a basketball by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: walk over to the bed standing in front of the ladder
pick up the basketball from the floor
Bring the basketball over to the window across the room
turn on the lamp above to examine the ball
anns.task_desc: pick up a ball from the floor then examine the ball under the lamp

high_descs: Turn around and walk toward the wall between the desk and the bed
Pick up the basketball from the floor
Turn and walk to the left side of the desk
Turn on the light
anns.task_desc: Pick up the basketball and turn on the light

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the desk, then turn to the right and walk towards the bunk beds.
Pick up the basketball on the ground.
Turn to the right and walk across the room, then turn right and walk to the trash bin.
Hold the basketball above the trash bin.
anns.task_desc: Carry the basketball to the other side of the room.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the wall near the end of the bunk beds and face them.
Pick up the basketball on the floor.
Turn around and walk to the end of the desk.
Turn on the light.
